headline.main: HONG KONG DISORDER IS REPORTED IN CHINA; War Prisoners Forced to Labor, Escaped Resident Says

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, Jan. 31 (Reuter) -- Disorder is rife in Hong Kong under the Japanese, according to Hu Lin, general manager of the Chinese newspaper Ta Kung Pao, who recently escaped to Free China.
abstract: Percival's career revd; Hu Lin on conditions, Hong Kong
